speaker: Mirror Wastes
line: Ice plates reflect the sky so perfectly you can’t tell if you’re walking on ground or falling upward.

speaker: Reflection
line: For a heartbeat, you see yourself turn left when you turn right.

speaker: Your Journal
line: If answers exist here, they will not come gently.

choices.text: Take the next contract and follow it like a straight line.
Mark Mirror Wastes as a checkpoint.

speaker: Mirror Wastes
line: Your shadow looks wrong for a moment—then remembers how to behave.
